Improve this resume bullet:
""Looking for a ghostwriter who has both writing experience AND personal experience in 'floral business, opening a flower shop', including topics such as how to start a small business, floral network, training florists, arranging flowersWe are a growing publishing company in the US. We can provide steady, long-term work as long as you deliver quality work.Each book will be 30,000 words long, and the rate is $2.3 per 100 words.You will need to submit the work for me to check at every 10,000 words along with a [REDACTED_PHONE] word test job initially. This ensures that the book is heading in the right direction (this saves both of our time and avoids revisions). The payment will be sent only after the entire 30,000-word work is completed.We are looking for someone who can write and reference a source to the information and add their personal experience to it. Not just write a book based on their personal experience. Language teaching experience would be a plus.Qualifications:- Able to deliver a 30,000-word book on time (2-4 weeks)- personal experience in the topics mentioned above- The ability to research the topic in detail- Free of grammatical errors and typos.- Great communication (Replies back at least once every 24 hours)- Plagiarism-free content - (we check BOTH plagiarism and encoding texts)- Cares about the quality of content you are writing and providing the readers with value- Fluent in written English and speak FrenchPlease apply with:- The phrase "Brown Puppy".- Attach a sample of your previous work, preferably related to a French topic- Please explain what kind of personal experience you have in the floral business/florists/flower shop and why you think you’re qualified for this position.Thank you, and I'm looking forward to working with you.Budget: $2,000Posted On: February 18, 2024 20:45 UTCCategory: GhostwritingSkills:Content Writing, Writing, Market ResearchSkills: Content Writing, Writing, Market ResearchCountry: United States""

""### Technical Guide for Programming a Comprehensive Trading Strategy Indicator#### IntroductionThis guide elaborates on developing a market structure indicator strategy optimized for futures trading, detailing the algorithmic identification of market trends, pivot points, divergences, and incorporating a robust risk management strategy in line with Topstep's proprietary trading combine principles.#### Programming Specifications**Data Source (src) Selection**- Enable selection from a variety of data points (high, low, close, open, HL, HLC, OHLC, HLCC) to form the basis of the indicator, essential for comprehensive market analysis.**Pivot Points Detection Algorithm**- Implement an algorithm to identify Pivot Highs and Lows using Left Bar (LB) and Right Bar (RB) criteria, including horizontal line extensions from pivot points with customizable fill features.**Trend Lines Functionality**- Code logic for drawing diagonal lines connecting significant market points, with visibility customization options for user preferences.**Divergence Detection Mechanism**- Integrate RSI settings for identifying regular and hidden divergences to aid in predicting market reversals or continuations.**Breakouts and Breakdowns Signals and Trade Entries**- Design a system not just for alerting on breakouts and breakdowns but also for executing trades on these signals. Include functionality to highlight potential reversals following pivot point confirmation and specify trade entry points at the breakout or breakdown levels, incorporating divergence rules for additional confirmation.#### Algorithmic Trading Logic**Understanding Market Structure**- Code algorithms to identify and classify market trends: uptrends (HH and HL), downtrends (LL and LH), and sideways trends (flat highs and lows).**Trade Entries and Exits**- **Uptrends**: Code buy entries on retracements to HL with exits targeting HH, placing stop losses below the recent HL.- **Downtrends**: Initiate shorts on pullbacks to LH, targeting LL with stop losses set above the LH.- **Sideways Trends**: Enable trades between support and resistance, setting stop losses outside the range to minimize risk.- **Breakouts and Breakdowns**: Implement trade entries at the point of breakout or breakdown, with stops placed just outside the breakout/breakdown level to manage risk effectively. Divergence considerations should refine these entries, enhancing the strategy's precision.**Utilizing RSI for Trade Confirmation**- Employ RSI analysis to bolster trade entry and exit decisions, providing a multifaceted approach to market engagement.#### Risk Management- Implementation of a 3:1 minimum risk-reward ratio for all trades.- Inclusion of stop loss and target settings for comprehensive trade management.- The strategy is to be optimized for E-mini futures trading (ES, NQ), considering prop firm combine rules, including varying start funds and contract-based futures trading.### Development Specifications- **Platform Compatibility**: Aimed primarily for NinjaTrader with potential adaptability for other platforms.- **Optimization for Prop Firm Combine**: Strategy testing against Topstep's combine rules, focusing on risk management, starting funds, and trading objectives. There are 3 combines so user should be able to select the combine strategy in the settings of the indicator.- **Trade Management**: Features ensuring trades align with the predominant trend and mechanisms for pinpointing optimal entries and exits.### Deliverables1. **Custom Indicator**: A trading indicator developed according to the provided specifications.2. **Documentation**: Comprehensive documentation on installation, configuration, and utilization of the indicator.3. **Testing Results**: A report analyzing the indicator's performance, especially regarding Topstep's combine requirements.#### ConclusionThis guide furnishes programmers with a detailed blueprint for developing a trading strategy indicator that fulfills the strategic and risk management criteria crucial for successful futures trading within the Topstep combine. Incorporating these elements ensures the creation of a sophisticated tool that not only automates market trend identification but also embeds stringent risk management protocols.**Optimization for Prop Firm Combine**- Integrate an option within the indicator settings for users to select their specific Topstep combine strategy, adjusting the trading parameters accordingly. This ensures the strategy's adaptability and facilitating trader success across different combine levels.Hourly Range: $30.00-$60.00Posted On: February 14, 2024 04:50 UTCCategory: Scripting & AutomationSkills:TradingView, Trading Automation, Trading Strategy, NinjaTrader, C#Skills: TradingView, Trading Automation, Trading Strategy, NinjaTrader, C#Country: United States""
